summary: Completed testing of FLULANCE FAZ 1 features: Profile dropdown fix, Brand Profile modal, and Job creation modal with extended fields. Fixed critical React Hook error in Navbar.js. All backend APIs and frontend UI flows working correctly.

fixed_issues.issue: React Hook 'useEffect' called conditionally - violates Rules of Hooks
fixed_issues.fix: Moved second useEffect before the conditional return statement

critical_code_review_comments: Navbar.js had a React Hook violation - useEffect was placed after a conditional return. This was fixed by moving all hooks before any conditional returns.
seed_data_creation: Created test jobs via API and UI during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAZ 1 features are complete and working. Profile dropdown opens correctly, Brand Profile modal saves data to backend, Job creation modal with extended fields (deadline_days, revision_rounds, content_requirements, target_audience, copyright) works correctly. Session token for brand user: session_eebc83cc0c7942d5bb693c671b2310e3

profile_dropdown.details: Dropdown opens on click, shows user info, Panelim link navigates to /brand

brand_profile_modal.details: Modal opens, form fields work, data saves to backend via POST /api/brand-profile

job_creation_modal.details: Extended form with Zaman Çizelgesi, İçerik Gereksinimleri, Influencer Gereksinimleri sections all work. Data saves correctly via POST /api/jobs
